00006 package edu.stanford.atom.sti.client.gui.tabbedplotter;

00008 import javax.swing.*;
00009 import java.util.Vector;
00010 import java.io.*;
00011 import javax.swing.text.*;
00012 
00017 public class TabbedPlotter {
00018     
00019     private Vector<TabbedPlot> tabbedPlotVector = new Vector<TabbedPlot>();
00020     private int tabCount = 0;
00021     public javax.swing.JLabel caretPositionLabelLocal;
00022     private javax.swing.JTabbedPane outputPaneLocal;
00023     private javax.swing.JFrame jFrameLocal;
00024     private javax.swing.JTextArea inputTextAreaLocal;
00025     
00032     public TabbedPlotter(javax.swing.JTextArea inputTextArea, 
00033             javax.swing.JTabbedPane outputPane,
00034             javax.swing.JFrame jFrame){
00035         
00036         tabCount = 0;
00037         registerFrame(jFrame);
00038         registerTabbedPane(outputPane);
00039         registerInputTextArea(inputTextArea);
00040         //registerCaretPositionLabel(caretPositionLabel);
00041 
00042 
00043         outputPane.addChangeListener(new javax.swing.event.ChangeListener() {
00044 
00045             public void stateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {
00046                 tabbedPaneStateChanged(evt);
00047             }
00048         });
00049     }
00054     public void registerTabbedPane(javax.swing.JTabbedPane jTabbedPane) {
00055         outputPaneLocal = jTabbedPane;
00056     }
00061     public void registerInputTextArea(javax.swing.JTextArea jTextArea){
00062         inputTextAreaLocal = jTextArea;
00063     }
00068     public void registerFrame(javax.swing.JFrame jFrame) {
00069         jFrameLocal = jFrame;
00070     }
00075     public void registerCaretPositionLabel(javax.swing.JLabel caretPositionLabel) {
00076         caretPositionLabelLocal = caretPositionLabel;
00077     }
00078 
00083     private void tabbedPaneStateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {
00084         updateInputTextArea();
00085     }
00092     private void updateInputTextArea() {
00093         if(outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex() > -1){
00094             inputTextAreaLocal.replaceRange(tabbedPlotVector.elementAt(
00095                 outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex()).getPlotsAsString(), 0, 
00096                     inputTextAreaLocal.getText().length());
00097         } else if(outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex() == -1) {
00098             inputTextAreaLocal.replaceRange(null, 0, inputTextAreaLocal.getText().length());
00099         }
00100     }
00106     public void addPlotterTab(TabbedPlot tabbedPlot, String input) {
00107         outputPaneLocal.addTab(tabbedPlot.getTabTitle(),
00108                 tabbedPlot.createTab(input));
00109     }
00113     public void updatePlotterTab(String inputString) {
00114         int i = outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex();
00115         if(i >= 0){
00116             TabbedPlot tabbedPlot = tabbedPlotVector.elementAt(i);
00117             if(tabbedPlot != null) {
00118                 tabbedPlot.setActivePlot(inputString);
00119                 //updateInputTextArea();
00120             }
00121         }   
00122     }
00123     
00132     public void removePlotterTab() {
00133         removePlotterTab(outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex());
00134     }
00135 
00136     public void removePlotterTab(int tabIndex)
00137             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00138 
00139         if (tabIndex >= tabbedPlotVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00140             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00141         }
00142         outputPaneLocal.removeTabAt(tabIndex);
00143         tabbedPlotVector.remove(tabIndex);
00144         //Reindex so TabbedDocument indicies match JTabbedPane indicies
00145         for (int i = tabIndex; i < tabbedPlotVector.size(); i++) {
00146             tabbedPlotVector.elementAt(i).setTabIndex(i);
00147         }
00148     }
00149 
00153     public void closeActiveTab() {
00154         if(outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex() > -1) {
00155             closeFileInTab(outputPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex());
00156         }
00157     }
00158 
00166     public boolean closeFileInTab(int tabIndex)
00167             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00168 
00169         if (tabIndex >= tabbedPlotVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00170             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00171         } else {        
00172             removePlotterTab(tabIndex);
00173             return true;
00174         }
00175 
00176     }
00181     public void createNewTab(String input) {
00182         tabCount++;
00183 
00184         tabbedPlotVector.addElement(
00185                 new TabbedPlot(this,
00186                 tabbedPlotVector.size(), tabCount));
00187 
00188         addPlotterTab(tabbedPlotVector.lastElement(), input);
00189 
00190         // Ensure the new tab is active
00191         outputPaneLocal.setSelectedIndex(
00192                 tabbedPlotVector.lastElement().getTabIndex());
00193         
00194         //tabbedPlotVector.lastElement().setGraphRange(-15, 15, -2, 8);
00195     }
00200     public int getUntitledDocCount() {
00201         return tabCount;
00202     }
00203 }
